abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews concert of several classical Indian dance pieces performed by dancer Rama Vaidyanathan at the Skirball Center at New York University.
snippet: With “Sannidhanam: The Temple and the Goddess,” the dancer Rama Vaidyanathan brought southern India’s Bharatanatyam style of movement to New York University on Friday.
lead_paragraph: With “Sannidhanam: The Temple and the Goddess,” the dancer Rama Vaidyanathan brought southern India’s Bharatanatyam style of movement to New York University on Friday.

headline.main: Love and Eros in Motion Among the Deities
headline.print_headline: Love and Eros in Motion Among the Deities
headline.seo: Rama Vaidyanathan at Skirball Center - Review
